alert.note: Alert for Kent; Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 3:21PM EDT until July 25 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sussex County in southern Delaware... Central Kent County in central Delaware... Southeastern Caroline County in eastern Maryland... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 321 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Dover Speedway to near Milford to Smithville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Milford, Harrington, Camden, Lewes, Milton, Bridgeville, Cheswold, Ellendale, Bowers, Woodside, Smithville, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Agner, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Andrewsville, Rising Sun, Big Stone Beach and Wyoming. People at the Delaware State Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
